boat.construction_details: Larch on oak, Canvassed t & g pine decks, teak trim.
boat.full_description: Log 80/1 Converted from center boarder in late 50s by Fox of Ipswich. Counter rebuilt 1973 New Saab 8 h.p. diesel 1976. Keel bolts 1976. Pickled in 10 gallons of Brunaphen 1978. New main, jib, staysail, topsail by J. Lawrence of Brightlingsea 1979. New Bosch dynastart electrics, h/d battery, tricolour, auto bilge pump 1979. New boom & all running rigging 1979.
boat.name: Gauntlet
